description_en: CPI by state for 12 main groups of goods and services, consistent with the United Nations "Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP)".
description_ms: IHP mengikut negeri bagi 12 kumpulan utama barangan dan perkhidmatan, selaras dengan klasifikasi berpandukan United Nations "Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP)".
methodology_en: The index is compiled based on the average price change for goods and services collected according to price collection centers in the state.
methodology_ms: Indeks disusun berdasarkan perubahan purata harga bagi barangan dan perkhidmatan yang dikutip mengikut pusat pungutan harga di dalam negeri.
caveat_en: This index is compiled based on Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP).
caveat_ms: Indeks ini disusun berdasarkan Classification of Individual Consumption According to Purpose (COICOP).
publication_en: [Consumer Price Index, Jul 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-07_cpi.pdf), the latest edition of the monthly consumer price statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on consumer prices](https://open.dosm.gov.my/consumer-prices).
publication_ms: [Indeks Harga Pengguna, Jul 2023](https://storage.googleapis.com/dosm-public-publications/monthly_2023-07_cpi.pdf), edisi terkini bagi statistik harga pengguna yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang harga pengguna](https://open.dosm.gov.my/consumer-prices).

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to -01-01
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD diberi nilai -01-01

fields.name: category
fields.description_en: [Categorical] 13 values either denoting headline CPI, or one of the 12 main COICOP categories.
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] 13 nilai sama ada bagi IHP keseluruhan, ataupun satu daripada 12 kategori utama COICOP.

fields.name: johor
fields.description_en: [Float] Index with base 2010 = 100, showing the CPI value for Johor by category of consumption.
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Indeks dengan asas 2010 = 100, yang menunjukkan nilai IHP untuk Johor mengikut kategori perbelanjaan.
